articles.description: Wales' hopes of automatic qualification for Euro 2024 suffered a devastating blow as they could only draw with Armenia in Yerevan.
articles.title: Wales dealt big Euros blow by drawing with Armenia

articles.description: World champion Max Verstappen and Ferrari driver Charles Leclerc sum up the contradictions of the inaugural Las Vegas Grand Prix, which has so far been both farcical and spectacular at different turns.
articles.title: If I was a fan, I would tear Las Vegas down - Verstappen

articles.description: Lauren James scores three and makes one as Chelsea beat Liverpool to move six points clear at the top of the Women's Super League.
articles.title: James shines as WSL leaders Chelsea beat Liverpool

articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentary from three fixtures in the Premiership and Championship.
articles.title: Listen: Harlequins host Saracens after Tigers beat Northampton

articles.description: Live coverage as Hannah Rankin aims to become Scotland's first female unified world champion when she fights Ema Kozin for the WBC and WBO light-middleweight belts.
articles.title: Rankin targets WBC and WBO light-middleweight belts against Kozin

articles.description: Lauren James scores one and assists another goal as Chelsea lead Liverpool 2-1 at half-time in the WSL match at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: James stars at Stamford Bridge as Chelsea lead Liverpool

articles.description: Australia know what to expect from a partisan crowd in Sunday's World Cup final, but the underdogs have enough to ensure an India win is not yet certain.
articles.title: India seek immortality in World Cup final against Australia

articles.description: Leicester Tigers overcome a stubborn Northampton Saints in the East Midlands derby for their first Premiership home win of the season.
articles.title: Leicester beat Saints in derby for first home win

articles.description: Andy Murray withdraws from Great Britain's team for the Davis Cup Finals because of a shoulder injury.
articles.title: Murray pulls out of GB Davis Cup team with injury

articles.description: Jannik Sinner becomes the first Italian to reach the final of the ATP Finals after his victory over Daniil Medvedev.
articles.title: Sinner beats Medvedev to set up ATP Finals title shot
